CHAT.comment: Time is 0:04. Tape begins in middle of utterance
Chi writes the letter on his own with a little help from EXP. Mot according to the context notes is not paying attention to the activity but was filling out a form

u.a: aft Chi looks through the book
silence follows and then phone rings . Mot answers it . Mot is upset at her daughter who is over at her grandmother's
bef phone rings again and Mot gets up to answer phone
tells daugher over the phone to behave herself and hangs up phone . Another sister comes in , whom Mot introduces to EXP . The three of them talk .
MOT telling Chi's sister to stay there . Chi leaves the room promising to stay out of trouble
